snippet: In a season of absurdities, the Jets have added an unexpected one: they are in the playoff conversation, which they won’t talk about.
abstract: New York Jets unlikely victory over Jacksonville Jaguars, coupled with losses by Cincinnati Bengals and Pittsburgh Steelers, has put them in unexpected contention for the playoffs.
lead_paragraph: In a season of absurdities, the Jets have added an unexpected one: they are in the playoff conversation, which they won’t talk about.

headline.seo: Jets Generate a Different and Unexpected Drama
headline.main: The Jets, at 6-7, Gain Unexpected Playoff Hopes Amid the Usual Drama
headline.print_headline: The Jets, at 6-7, Gain Unexpected Playoff Hopes Amid the Usual Drama
